TopicTitle: How do I make it so the map view will show orbit predictions across more SOI changes?

Articles.Content: Sorry, I forget how this is called. There's a setting for this, I had it in 1.05. Can you please point me to where I can change this again?
You have to do this by hand. In the main KSP install folder edit the line "CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT = 3" in settings.cfg. The bigger the number, the more paths are drawn

7 minutes ago, kujuman said:
